President Barack Obama: s visit to the Texas-Mexico border on May 10, 2011, where he gave a speech on immigration reform.
Governor Scott Walker: s statement claiming that he had been to the border with the governor of Texas, implying that Obama had not.
Spokeswoman AshLee Strong: s response, stating that Obama chose not to go to the border during a humanitarian crisis in 2014.
Obama: s altered plans during his Texas trip in 2014, which included a meeting with then-Gov. Rick Perry and local officials to discuss the border situation, but he did not visit the border itself.
